## ParsedMessageCommand

<GenerationInfo sourceFile="packages/commandkit/src/app/commands/MessageCommandParser.ts" sourceLine="19" packageName="commandkit" />

Represents a parsed message command with its components.

```ts title="Signature"
interface ParsedMessageCommand {
    command: string;
    options: { name: string; value: unknown }[];
    subcommand?: string;
    subcommandGroup?: string;
}
```
